meanings.definition: To make an opening, incision, or wound with a sharp-edged tool or object.
meanings.sent1: She used a knife to cutto the paper.
meanings.sent2: The chef will cutto the vegetables for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally cutto his finger while slicing the bread.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor cutto into the clay to create intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The tailor will cutto the fabric to make the dress fit perfectly.

meanings.definition: A reduction or decrease in size, amount, or extent.
meanings.sent1: The company announced a cutto in prices for the upcoming sale.
meanings.sent2: There was a noticeable cutto in the number of attendees at the event.
meanings.sent3: The sudden cutto in funding left the project in jeopardy.
meanings.sent4: The doctor recommended a cutto in sugar intake for better health.
meanings.sent5: The decision to implement a cutto in staff was met with mixed reactions.

meanings.definition: A passage or route that has been shortened or diverted.
meanings.sent1: The hikers took a scenic cutto through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The road construction forced a temporary cutto for traffic.
meanings.sent3: The shortcut turned out to be a longer cutto than expected.
meanings.sent4: The map highlighted a convenient cutto to avoid heavy traffic.
meanings.sent5: The GPS suggested a new cutto to reach the destination faster.

meanings.definition: A style or shape of a garment that is tailored to fit closely to the body.
meanings.sent1: She chose a sleek cutto dress for the evening event.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased a collection of elegant cutto gowns.
meanings.sent3: The tailored cutto of the suit accentuated his physique.
meanings.sent4: The actress wore a stunning cutto gown on the red carpet.
meanings.sent5: The custom-made cutto jacket was a perfect fit for him.
